channel.title: How come on my server my tormented demons dont drop nun? (read more)
channel.description:
On my server my tormented demons dont drop anything and i have my npcdrop set like this below:
#torm demon 117:1 1163:1 1093:1 1247:1 14484:40 995:1200 892:150
i have everything correct and it still dont even drop bones why is this?
